response.original_title: How to cancel Norton subscription on phone ?  {{CANCELATION~GUIDE}}
response.overview: The most direct way (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>) to stop billing if you subscribed through the Android app is via your Google account settings. This action (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>) ensures the Play Store stops processing payments for the next cycle. If you have (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>) already been charged and need a refund, you must use the Google Play "Request a Refund" tool or contact (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>) Norton Support directly to claim your 60-day money-back guarantee.
